mapper.update: update user_info set user_nick_name = #{userNickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_register_time = #{userRegisterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_head_url = #{userHeadUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sex = #{userSex,jdbcType=BIT}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_birthday_type = #{userBirthdayType,jdbcType=BIT}, user_desc = #{userDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_nick_name, user_register_time, user_head_url, user_sex, user_birthday, user_birthday_type, user_desc, user_last_login_time from user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select user_id, user_nick_name, user_register_time, user_head_url, user_sex, user_birthday, user_birthday_type, user_desc, user_last_login_time from user_info
